Body:
"""
        Tests for single chain in one PDB
        """
chain = chains_1BTA[0]
assert chain[index].format() == ref
pytest.mark.parametrize('index,ref', ((0,
    'ATOM      1    N LYS A   1      -8.655   5.770   8.371  0.00  0.00              '
    ), (-1,
    'ATOM   1434   HG SER A  89       6.663  12.440   4.229  0.00  0.00              '
    )))
